name: Constellation Commode/Bar
description: The constellation commode is the perfect storage unit or bar for a living room or dining area. The amorphous shaped piece is either completely inlaid in black shagreen, with a stunning Smokey black quartz top or the whole piece is completely inlaid in cream shagreen. The piece sits on a pair of tubular bronze-patina brass legs. The interior is inlaid in gemelina wood and features two adjustable/removable shelves shaped like the piece. The piece is accented by discreet flat bronze-patina brass handles to open and close the commode.
